name: Accesstream
tag_list: open-source-authentication, user-access-management, application-security, open-source-identity-management, identity-access-management, access-management, open-source-application-security, authorization, authentication, pci-compliance, ldap, saml
overview:
Accesstream is an open source security software company that offers one of the first commercial enterprise Identity Access Management (IAM) solutions on the market.

Accesstream’s solution helps organizations centralize and simplifying the security administration of their computer systems and applications, which reduces labor costs and limits potentially damaging administrative access errors. Accesstream’s enterprise view of security access across an environment improves reporting, auditing and adherence to compliance regulations.

Accesstream’s solution includes single sign-on (SSO) and self-service password reset capabilities reduces costly calls to the help desk and improves the productivity of users across an organization.

Accesstream is free to download and has no licensing fees, which makes it an affordable alternative to far more expensive proprietary solutions.

Accesstream’s open source approach allows developers from around the world to enhance the Accesstream solution by creating their own interfaces and plug-ins for the benefit of themselves and the Accesstream community.
